item.title: The Crypto Market Is a Gamble. Regulating It Shouldn't Be.
item.description: The Crypto Market Is a Gamble. Regulating It Shouldn’t Be. The cryptocurrency market is a highly volatile and risky place to invest. Prices can fluctuate wildly in a short period of time, and there is no guarantee that cryptocurrency will ever be a viable currency.
